channel.title: Starting Own Source
channel.description:
Hey Everyone, I am starting my own PI based source but I need some help. Firstly, the link for the client is dead can anyone get me another one which works please? Secondly, I need suggestions on what to add which mostly no other servers have. Last but not least is PI a good base to start with I really like pi's but I have never coded so is it good to code?
Thanks, zBeastKiiD

item.title: Starting Own Source
item.dc:creator: @zBeastKiiD zBeastKiiD
item.description:
@zBeastKiiD wrote:

Not sure if I want to team up I want to do a 1 Man Project.

Sorry.

Read full topic

@zBeastKiiD wrote:

Im not really sure how you make a server stable

But I will do my best

item.title: Starting Own Source
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

It is a good beginner’s source. In order to make it good though, you have to of put a lot of work into it to make it more stable then they time you downloaded it.

Read full topic
